name: swankyboys-affiliate-system
description: Complete affiliate marketing system for SwankyBoys.com using Cloudflare services

scripts.build: npm run build:swankyboyz && npm run build:tours && npm run build:personal
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:swankyboyz && npm run deploy:tours && npm run deploy:personal
scripts.db:create: wrangler d1 create swankyboyz-db && wrangler d1 create tours-db && wrangler d1 create personal-db
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:migrate:swankyboyz && npm run db:migrate:tours && npm run db:migrate:personal
scripts.db:seed: npm run db:seed:swankyboyz && npm run db:seed:tours
scripts.db:check: wrangler d1 execute swankyboyz-db --command='SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type="table"'
scripts.worker:deploy: wrangler deploy workers/link-redirect.js && wrangler deploy workers/click-tracker.js && wrangler deploy workers/content-generator.js && wrangler deploy workers/contact-form.js
